definitions.title: adj.
definitions.body: gracious, only used as an attribute of God, as hearing the cry of the vexed debtor Ex 22:26 (covt. code), ‖ [[מְרַחֵם]] Ps 116:5; elsewhere in the earlier phrase [[רֵחוּס וְחַנּוּן]] Ex 34:6 (JE) = Ps 86:15, Ps 103:8, or the later [[חַנּוּן וְרַחוּס]] 2Ch 30:9, Ne 9:17, Ne 9:31, Ps 111:4, Ps 112:4, Ps 145:8, Joe 2:13, Jon 4:2.
